page.title: 09Moving House
page.content:
{ A TEN YEAR OLD GIRL SAYS: { { }My mum decided to move house because she didn't like walking up and down stairs. We lived in a flat in the middle of a high building. She was tired carrying the baby up stairs all the time. The house was old and damp and too cold for the baby.
{She didn't like living where there {were no shops.We used to walk to Great {Homer Street but it's too far to carry {much. Now we are near lots of shops {where she can get everything fresh. { { }We moved by Walton Hospital. We've got a garden of our own now. It is much better here because it is quiet and we have good neighbours. The children are kind. I like it here and my family never want to move again.
